title: Askja on fire: volcanic eruption in Iceland 1961
brief_description: Shows the massive eruption of the volcano Askja in the central highlands of Iceland in 1961. Presents contrasting scenes of the glowing molten lava against a background of snow and ice. Narrated by Brian D. Holt. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
